title: Lamb and red lentil shepherd’s pie

instructions.step: Spritz a large pan with oil, add the onion, carrot and lamb and cook for 5 minutes. Add the rosemary, tomatoes, lentils and stock. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 15 minutes until tender add a splash of water if it’s a little dry.
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes and parsnips in a pan of water for 15 minutes until tender, then drain well and mash with the quark and parsley.
Preheat the oven to 190ºC, gas mark 5. Transfer the filling to a heatproof dish and spoon over the mash. Bake for 20-25 minutes until the top is crusty and golden.
